string-array.name: securityQuestionOneChoices

What was the make and model of your first car?
What was your high school mascot?
What was the name of your favorite childhood pet?

resources.string: Study, work, play, and do not go broke.

Whether you plan to bungee jump in NZ, shop on the Champs-Elysees, hike up to Machu Picchu, or take a taxi through Tokyo you need to make sure you do not run out of cash. Creating, using, and updating a personal or family budget can help you achieve your goals and develop a sense of safety and self-reliance. If you do not have one yet, do not worry! We will explain a few key concepts and help you get started making your dreams into reality with Midas.
Decide what you are about. Think long term and consider your future needs. What core values and beliefs are most important to you?

Write your goals down. Determine the costs of your goals in money, time, and effort. Set time frames for when your goals can reasonably be accomplished. And finally, share your goals with others who can help you stay accountable.
Take a few minutes now to set goals. We recommend using a vision board in a private space to help inspire and motivate you. Remember to keep your goals SMART:
Finished setting goals? Great! You are ready to start learning how to use Midas to make your financial goals into financial reality.
Now categorize your monthly spending. Try to spend less than you earn so that you can have the financial resources to achieve your goals.
